alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 317 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eureka, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eureka and Pinto Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
